__TOC__

<<BR>>Install the Bird Internet Routing Daemon:
<<BR>>`sudo apt-get install bird3 || sudo apt-get install bird2`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Enable IPv4 and IPv6 Forwarding:
<<BR>>`echo "net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`echo "net.ipv4.conf.default.forwarding=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`sed 's/#net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1/net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1/g' /etc/sysctl.conf | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`echo "net.ipv6.conf.default.forwarding=1" | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf`
<<BR>>`sudo sysctl -p`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Backup the configuration file:
<<BR>>`sudo mv /etc/bird/bird.conf /etc/bird/bird.conf.original`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Create the configuration files:
<<BR>>`sudo nano `<nowiki>[[attachment:bird.conf|-etc-bird-bird.conf]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>`sudo nano `<nowiki>[[attachment:bird6.conf|-etc-bird-bird6.conf]]</nowiki>
<<BR>>`sudo chmod o-r /etc/bird/bird.conf && sudo chown bird:bird /etc/bird/bird.conf`
<<BR>>`sudo touch /etc/bird/bird.mrt && sudo chmod o-r /etc/bird/bird.mrt && sudo chown bird:bird /etc/bird/bird.mrt`
<<BR>>`sudo chown -R bird:bird /etc/bird`
<<BR>>`sudo find /etc/bird -type f -exec chmod 640 {} +`
<<BR>>`sudo find /etc/bird -type d -exec chmod 755 {} +`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Use this one-liner to give bird6 a random four byte number to use for its Router Identifier: 
<<BR>>`sudo sed -i "s/0.0.0.1;\t#\tRouter ID must be configured manually on IPv6 routers/`<code>`od -A n -N 1 -t u1 < /dev/urandom | sed 's/ //g'`</code>`.`<code>`od -A n -N 1 -t u1 < /dev/urandom | sed 's/ //g'`</code>`.`<code>`od -A n -N 1 -t u1 < /dev/urandom | sed 's/ //g'`</code>`.`<code>`od -A n -N 1 -t u1 < /dev/urandom | sed 's/ //g'`</code>`;/g" /etc/bird/bird6.conf`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>Restart the daemons:
<<BR>>`sudo service bird restart || sudo /etc/init.d/bird restart`
<<BR>>
<<BR>>
